description: Verified public data sources for ESG/sustainability reports with API access

data_sources.name: CDP Climate Change Responses
data_sources.description: CDP (formerly Carbon Disclosure Project) - 13,000+ companies, standardized climate responses

authentication.notes: Public Open Data Portal - no API key required

data_sources.notes: Best for quantitative climate metrics, standardized responses

data_sources.name: SEC EDGAR - 10-K Risk Factors
data_sources.description: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission - All public U.S. companies

authentication.notes: Must include User-Agent header with contact email per SEC policy

rate_limits.notes: SEC requires: Max 10 requests per second, User-Agent with contact info

data_sources.notes: Item 1A Risk Factors often contains climate/ESG risks. Legally binding disclosure.

data_sources.name: GRI Sustainability Disclosure Database
data_sources.description: Global Reporting Initiative - 60,000+ reports from 15,000+ organizations

authentication.notes: Public database, web interface only (no API)

data_sources.notes: Comprehensive but requires web scraping. Links to original reports.

data_sources.name: CSRHub ESG Ratings

authentication.notes: Free tier available (limited), paid for full access

data_sources.notes: Aggregated ESG ratings, not original reports. Useful for validation.

data_sources.name: Direct Company Investor Relations
data_sources.description: Direct downloads from company IR/sustainability pages

rate_limits.notes: Respect robots.txt, use rate limiting per domain

data_sources.notes: Most direct and comprehensive, but requires manual URL discovery or search

data_sources.name: SustainabilityReports.com
data_sources.notes: Useful aggregator but requires web scraping. No API confirmed.

fallback_strategy.description: Multi-tier fallback approach for reliable data acquisition

tiers.description: Primary: Public APIs with high reliability and standardized data
Secondary: Comprehensive databases (may require scraping or API key)
Tertiary: Direct company sources (requires manual URL discovery)

recommended_workflow.step_1: Search CDP Open Data for company climate response (quantitative)
recommended_workflow.step_2: If U.S. company: Extract SEC 10-K Item 1A Risk Factors for qualitative ESG risks
recommended_workflow.step_3: Search GRI Database for full sustainability report link
recommended_workflow.step_4: If not found: Use company IR direct URL (requires manual lookup)
recommended_workflow.step_5: Validate against CSRHub ratings if available
